title: Homesteading with a FULL TIME Job!

subtasks: Get shower started and prepare to leave
Water and attend to animals (dressing them, feeding)
Let out and feed ducks, check for stragglers
Let kittens run around in barn after breakfast
Prepare for the day's work (e.g., checking greenhouse damage)
Address damage to greenhouse (applying temporary plastic wrap)
Clean chicken coop and outdoor area
Harvest rosemary and sunflowers in the Chaos Garden
